publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6052 Anne McLaughlin: Fair Fares for Glaswegiansâ€”That the Parliament notes that First in Glasgow is yet again increasing its bus fares for passengers in Glasgow; is concerned that fares on some routes have increased by 71% from 2003 to 2010, at a time when the cost of diesel has risen by 42%, and calls on First in Glasgow to reverse its decision to raise fares and to give the people of Glasgow a fair fare. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Christina McKelvie*, Bill Kidd*, Aileen Campbell*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-6052 Fair Fares for Glaswegians (lodged on 24 March 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
